# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: make a car model in Roblox

Відповідь: 1. Select "My Roblox" tab and go to "Create" page.

2. Click on "Roblox Studio" and choose "Start Creating" button.

3. On the left side of the screen look for the "Model" tab located below the "Explorer" tab, click it.

4. You will see a selection of pre- made models. Select a model that you like to use as a starting point for your car model. Alternatively, you can select the "Create New Model" option to begin creating a model from scratch.

5. From the Toolbox section, select the parts you want to add to the model and use the Move, Scale, and Rotate tools to customize them.

6. Add windows and doors to the model if it is a car.

7. If you want to add textures to the model, go to the "Explorer" tab and select the "Texture" tab. Select the textures you want to use and apply it to the car model.

8. Once you are done, select the "Save" button to save the model.
